name: Shrimp Alfredo
recipeIngredient: 2 Tbsp Balsamic vinagrette dressing (terry uses more)

recipeInstructions.text: Saute shrimp in balsamic vinagrette. Add garlic and cook for 3 more minutes. Add more balsamic if desired. Remove shrimp and keep warm. Add broth to same pan, add cream cheese till melted.
